alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Houston; Olmsted; Wabasha; Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 11:35AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms moving through parts of southeast Minnesota and northeast Iowa... At 1133 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Kellogg Minnesota to near Jerico Iowa. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Jerico around 1140 AM CDT. Lawler around 1145 AM CDT. Waucoma around 1150 AM CDT. Altura around 1155 AM CDT. Rollingstone and Hawkeye around 1200 PM CDT. Winona, West Union, Goodview and Stockton around 1205 PM CDT. Fayette around 1215 PM CDT. Arlington around 1225 PM CDT. People attending the Winona County Fairgrounds should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
